availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ossian T. Ward (Green County, Kentucky, attorney)

body.p: Greensburg, Kentucky, attorney. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of William T. Ward and Sarah T. Ward. Resident of Green County in 1850. Attorney in Greensburg in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 118; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Greensburg, District 2, p. 11; Find A Grave, "Ossian T. Ward (1837-1885)," Memorial #51394598, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=51394598 (accessed August 17, 2017).
